highlights.title: Pamba riverside stewardship
highlights.body: Community teams monitor the riverbanks connecting Chathenkery and Chengannur, pairing clean-ups with flood-readiness drills.

highlights.title: Gateway to Sabarimala care
highlights.body: Pilgrim transit desks at Chengannur transport hubs extend the town’s role as the “Gateway to Sabarimala” with rest stops, maps, and first-aid.

highlights.title: Grassroots learning pods
highlights.body: Youth mentors run evening digital literacy and language pods aligned with SNDP Yogam’s statewide education mission.

insights.title: 2024–25 priority tracks
items: Deploy solar lights around the SNDP hall and pilgrim rest centre.
Map vulnerable riverbank stretches with Chengannur Municipality.
Launch bilingual mentoring for Class 10 & 12 board exam cohorts.

insights.title: Community wellbeing indicators
items: 95 scholarship applications processed through the ward help desk.
40+ seniors receiving monthly wellness visits and mobility aid.
Six farmer clusters adopting organic manure through co-op ties.

paragraphs: Our directory keeps Chathenkery’s volunteer leads, youth convenors, and women’s wing accessible for pilgrim care and welfare programmes.
Reach out to coordinate river watch shifts, tuition pods, or municipal escalations across Chengannur’s riverbank wards.
list: Pilgrim transit desks: duty rosters for Mahadeva Temple and railway station help centres.
Community welfare: scholarship mentoring, senior-care visits, and microfinance facilitation contacts.

paragraphs: Ward notices highlight pilgrim season briefings, flood-readiness drills, and community library timings so residents can plan ahead.
list: Follow the November orientation to receive Sabarimala volunteer ID badges.
Join the October river siren test covering Chathenkery and neighbouring wards.

paragraphs: Scenes from Chathenkery’s pilgrim gateways, Pamba stewardship drives, and learning pods capture the ward’s yellow-hued identity.

gallery.title: Chengannur Mahadeva Temple transit hub
gallery.body: Volunteers guide Sabarimala-bound devotees at the Mahadeva Temple junction with route maps, rest points, and first-aid.

gallery.title: Pamba river clean-up corridors
gallery.body: Youth teams pair shoreline clean-ups with water sampling to support the Pamba rejuvenation mission around Chengannur.

gallery.title: SNDP reading room and digital lab
gallery.body: Study circles meet at the ward’s SNDP hall, blending Guru’s teachings with digital literacy modules for students and entrepreneurs.

paragraphs: The SNDP Chathenkery cooperative credit wing advances microloans that fund home repairs, education, and small enterprises across the ward.
Members can log in to review balances, repayment schedules, and the latest statements without leaving the neighbourhood office.
list: Ward manager dashboard tracks balances, contact history, and overdue nudges.
User view summarises principal, interest, and closing balance month by month.
Download-ready data supports audits for Chengannur Municipality tie-ups.
